name: Red Team
rules: You are on Red Team. You win if the President gains the "dead" condition.

name: Blue Team
rules: You are on Blue Team. You win if the President does not gain the "dead" condition.

name: Gambler
rules: At the end of the last round, before all players reveal their cards, you must publicly announce which team (Red Team, Blue Team, or neither) you think won the game. Win only if you are correct.
